meanings.definition: Situated within or occurring inside the eye.
meanings.sent1: The intraocular lens helped improve his vision.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the intraocular pressure of the patient's eye.
meanings.sent3: The tiny intraocular camera captured images inside the eye with precision.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with the intraocular world led her to pursue ophthalmology.
meanings.sent5: The intraocular surgery was successful in restoring her sight.

meanings.definition: Relating to or affecting the inside of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The intraocular medication helped treat the infection.
meanings.sent2: The specialist recommended an intraocular injection for the condition.
meanings.sent3: The intraocular examination revealed unexpected findings.
meanings.sent4: His intraocular expertise made him a sought-after eye surgeon.
meanings.sent5: The intraocular treatment provided relief for the patient's discomfort.
